option.value:
networks: gatekeep-network: driver: bridge
services: postgres: image: postgres:16-alpine container_name: gatekeep-postgres restart: unless-stopped environment: POSTGRES_DB: ${DB_NAME:-Gatekeep} POSTGRES_USER: ${DB_USER:-postgres} POSTGRES_PASSWORD: ${DB_PASSWORD} ports: - "${DB_PORT:-5432}:5432" volumes: - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data healthcheck: test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U ${DB_USER:-postgres} -d ${DB_NAME:-Gatekeep}"] interval: 10s timeout: 5s retries: 5 networks: - gatekeep-network
redis: image: redis:7-alpine container_name: gatekeep-redis restart: unless-stopped ports: - "6379:6379" volumes: - redis_data:/data command: ["redis-server", "--appendonly", "yes"] healthcheck: test: ["CMD", "redis-cli", "ping"] interval: 10s timeout: 5s retries: 5 networks: - gatekeep-network
seq: image: datalust/seq:latest container_name: gatekeep-seq restart: unless-stopped ports: - "5341:80" volumes: - seq_data:/data environment: - ACCEPT_EULA=Y - SEQ_FIRSTRUN_NOAUTHENTICATION=True healthcheck: test: ["CMD-SHELL", "curl -f http://localhost:80/api || exit 1"] interval: 10s timeout: 5s retries: 10 start_period: 30s networks: - gatekeep-network
prometheus: image: prom/prometheus:latest container_name: gatekeep-prometheus restart: unless-stopped ports: - "9090:9090" volumes: - prometheus_data:/prometheus - ./monitoring/prometheus.yml:/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml:ro command: - '--config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml' - '--storage.tsdb.path=/prometheus' - '--web.console.libraries=/usr/share/prometheus/console_libraries' - '--web.console.templates=/usr/share/prometheus/consoles' healthcheck: test: ["CMD-SHELL", "wget --no-verbose --tries=1 --spider http://localhost:9090/-/healthy || exit 1"] interval: 30s timeout: 10s retries: 3 networks: - gatekeep-network
grafana: image: grafana/grafana:latest container_name: gatekeep-grafana restart: unless-stopped ports: - "3001:3000" volumes: - grafana_data:/var/lib/grafana - ./monitoring/grafana/provisioning:/etc/grafana/provisioning:ro - ./monitoring/grafana/dashboards:/var/lib/grafana/dashboards:ro environment: - GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_USER=${GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_USER:-admin} - GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD=${GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD:-admin} - GF_INSTALL_PLUGINS= depends_on: prometheus: condition: service_healthy healthcheck: test: ["CMD-SHELL", "wget --no-verbose --tries=1 --spider http://localhost:3000/api/health || exit 1"] interval: 30s timeout: 10s retries: 3 networks: - gatekeep-network
api: build: context: . dockerfile: Dockerfile container_name: gatekeep-api restart: on-failure environment: ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT: ${APP_ENVIRONMENT:-Production} ASPNETCORE_URLS: "http://+:${GATEKEEP_PORT:-5011}" DATABASE__HOST: ${DB_HOST:-postgres} DATABASE__PORT: ${DB_PORT:-5432} DATABASE__NAME: ${DB_NAME:-Gatekeep} DATABASE__USER: ${DB_USER:-postgres} DATABASE__PASSWORD: ${DB_PASSWORD} REDIS__CONNECTIONSTRING: ${REDIS_CONNECTION:-redis:6379} REDIS__INSTANCENAME: ${REDIS_INSTANCE:-GateKeep:} REDIS__ENABLED: ${REDIS_ENABLED:-true} MONGODB_CONNECTION: ${MONGODB_CONNECTION:-} MONGODB_DATABASE: ${MONGODB_DATABASE:-GateKeepMongo} MONGODB_USE_STABLE_API: ${MONGODB_USE_STABLE_API:-false} JWT__KEY: ${JWT_KEY} JWT__ISSUER: ${JWT_ISSUER:-GateKeep} JWT__AUDIENCE: ${JWT_AUDIENCE:-GateKeepUsers} JWT__EXPIRATIONHOURS: ${JWT_EXPIRATION_HOURS:-8} SECURITY__PASSWORDMINLENGTH: ${SECURITY_PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH:-8} SECURITY__MAXLOGINATTEMPTS: ${SECURITY_MAX_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS:-5} SECURITY__LOCKOUTDURATIONMINUTES: ${SECURITY_LOCKOUT_DURATION_MINUTES:-15} ports: - "${GATEKEEP_PORT:-5011}:${GATEKEEP_PORT:-5011}" depends_on: postgres: condition: service_healthy redis: condition: service_healthy seq: condition: service_healthy networks: - gatekeep-network healthcheck: test: ["CMD-SHELL", "curl -f http://localhost:5011/health || exit 1"] interval: 30s timeout: 10s retries: 3 start_period: 40s # Si quieres montar config locales en vez de usar variables de entorno, descomenta: # volumes: # - ./GateKeep.Api/config.Production.json:/app/config.Production.json:ro # - ./GateKeep.Api/appsettings.Production.json:/app/appsettings.Production.json:ro
volumes: postgres_data: driver: local redis_data: driver: local seq_data: driver: local prometheus_data: driver: local grafana_data: driver: local
